casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

96-1997. State ex rel. Rea v. Ohio Dept. of Edn.

In Mandamus. On motion for attorney fees. Motion granted.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents for the reasons stated in her dissenting opinion in State ex rel. Rea v. Ohio Dept. of Edn. (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 527, 534-542, 692 N.E.2d 596, 603-608.
